There are 5 private rooms with moutain view
Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant or learn how to cook local food with family. 
The location is ideal for trekking. 
Local host-Mrs Cho speaks English fluently.

Dear Sir/ Madame,
We have bought 2 bus tickets Hanoi-Sapa-Hanoi and 2 open bus tickets Hanoi-Ninh Binh-Hue-Hoo An-Da Nang. During our first trip to Sa Pa on 22.11.2015, the tickets were taken from us and never returned. We now have no ticket to continue our travels. We feel that we were cheated and would like to inform you that we have already contacted our Embassy and that on our return to Hanoi on 25.11.2015 with the help of the Embassy we will contact the police. Unless we receive a full money refund or real tickets, we will notify the police.
The Sinh Tourist agent from which we bought our tickets is located in Hanoi on 52 Ma May street.
Looking forward to your reply
Michal Jatczak
